Primary Contact: Lucy Benwell, Executive Director; Email: execdir@kelownacommunitymusicschool.ca
Service Details: Encourages the instruction, participation, and appreciation of music * offers a broad range of musical instruction on most instruments including:  trumpet, clarinet, french horn, saxophone, trombone, tuba, piano, flute, voice, bassoon, guitar, cello, violin, viola, celtic harp, harp ensemble, harp orchestra, flute, jazz piano * also offers RCM theory, harmony, counterpoint theory, kindermusik, early childhood music programs, Orff-Schulwerk program, youth choir, music history, composition, chamber music, accompanying, KCMS festival orchestra, double bass, festival orchestra
